rounds.comments: (Alex: I'll give you an example: "A greeting for Raggedy Ann"--"What is 'Hello, Doll'"? Not "Hello, Dolly!" All right? We're dealing with musicals.)

rounds.text: Before he headed up the Supreme Court, he argued only 1 case before it--a 1796 case he ironically argued on states' rights grounds
